answers.answer: The objective of dopomoha.ro is to provide information and support for people from Ukraine who want to request help from Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '1. Objective of the Platform'.

answers.answer: Dopomoha.ro supports people from Ukraine by providing information and assistance to those who want to request help from Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '1. Objective of the Platform'.

answers.answer: Code for Romania processes personal data only in the interest of website users who wish to request support services dedicated to refugees. The specific types of personal data processed are not detailed in the document.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '3. Purpose and grounds'.

answers.answer: Code for Romania will not provide personal data to third parties. However, data can be provided to institutions, public authorities, or other competent state bodies based on legal provisions and express requests.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '5. Transfer of Personal Data to third parties'.

answers.answer: Dopomoha.ro users have rights including information, access, intervention, rectification, deletion, portability of personal data, and the right to address the National Supervisory Authority or judiciary. They also have rights to opposition, automated individual decision-making processes, and to restrict processing.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '6. Your rights'.

answers.answer: Code for Romania ensures data security by processing personal data according to Romanian legal provisions and by using state-of-the-art technologies and reasonable technical measures for secure and confidential transmission and storage.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '7. Security and Privacy'.

answers.answer: All personal data on the site are stored and processed on servers located in the European Union, and no information provided on this site leaves the territory of the European Union.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '7. Security and Privacy'.

answers.answer: Users are notified of a data security incident if it is likely to present a high risk to their rights and freedoms. The National Supervisory Authority is notified within 72 hours if an incident poses a risk to user rights and freedoms.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '7. Security and Privacy'.

answers.answer: The copyright for all information on the Dopomoha.ro website is owned by Code for Romania and the project partners. No material can be reproduced, in whole or in part, or modified without their express consent.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '8. Trademark and Copyright'.

answers.answer: Code for Romania reserves the right to revise and update the General Terms and Conditions of Use at any time, without notice or prior acceptance from users.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '9. Changes to the General Site Terms and Conditions of Use'.

answers.answer: Code for Romania's organizational goal is to mobilize young IT professionals to create digital tools that help solve social problems.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '10. About Code for Romania'.

answers.answer: Code for Romania can be contacted by email at contact@code4.ro or by mail at Pia»õa Alba Iulia no. 7, block I6, floor 1, apartment 6, Bucharest municipality, Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '11. Contact us'.
